item.title: Fidelity Employees Fired After Alleged Misuse of Reimbursement Programs
item.description: Fidelity Investments has fired or allowed more than 200 employees to resign over alleged misuse of workplace-benefits programs, according to people familiar with the matter. Read the full story here.
